Windlord/Nightlight::

"Then... Go to help them as soon as you help them you can trace our 
signhal..."Said the Hawk" Good luck and take care... I'll join you 
soon"

"Aerotaur..." said worried Nighlight "be... Careful"

"Let's go...  " added Windlord

The hawk flew towards the new base, Nighlight looked at Aerotaur and 
she doutbed if she should follow him or Windlord.

"Nightlight!!!" Windlord called her

"Take care..." said the femme and followed at Widnlord with the 
childrens. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Relax I'm right here.  And yes we'd better go help them."  He 
swoops 
> around landing to place the CR chamber down.  He soars back up into 
the air.  
> "Windlord, why don't you take them to the new Nightlight to the new 
base 
> along with Trinity, Zeni, and Termitron.  I'll go low and pick up 
Perplex, 
> Gramps, and Land Mine to check it out.  You can follow the signal 
back and 
> lead us to the base when you're done.  And who knows we may get 
some more 
> company."  He scans for Gramps and Perplex.  Gramps is moving 
faster so he 
> lands a short distance in front of him.  "Hop on there's no time to 
explain 
> but we're going on a rescue mission."
